page.title: 07Dangers on Cannock Chase
page.content: Most of the{dangers to animals,}on Cannock Chase, are caused by men. Poachers hunt the deer. Nearby farmers may use harmful sprays on their crops. The roads on Cannock Chase are dangerous for wild animals. Cars sometimes go so fast that they cannot stop if a deer runs out. As Cannock Chase is a {natural beauty spot} it is visited by many people especially in summer. Litter can cause problems. Crisp bags and polythene wrappers may seem like food to animals and they may eat them and suffocate or choke. Broken glass may cause injuries or start fires, and carelessness with matches and cigarettes can also cause fires especially in Spring and Summer, when the Chase is dry. {SO TAKE CARE PLEASE!}
